wikipedia_page.main: Vice-Admiral Sir John Stuart Crosbie Lea,  (4 June 1923 – 20 May 2015) was a senior Royal Navy officer who served as Director-General, Naval Manpower and Training from 1977 to 1980.

response: * 4 June – John Lea, Royal Navy vice-admiral (died 2015)
*Sir John Lea, 91, British Royal Navy vice-admiral.
